definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: It is useful to use greater value of detection angle for increasing the backscattering coefficient and ameliorating the ratio of signal to noise.
sentences.chinese: 可以利用大的探測角值提高背散射率以改善信噪比。

sentences.english: The results also show that significant performances the estimator in extreme low signal-to-noise ratio can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 同時該結果也顯示在低信噪比下的估計器的卓越性能。

sentences.english: In the ultrasonic testing of coarse grain materials, signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) is very low due to the serious structure noise.
sentences.chinese: 粗晶材料超聲檢測時，嚴重的結構噪聲使信噪比很低。

sentences.english: Signal-noise ratio of the system is improved with double beam mode and correlative detection technology .
sentences.chinese: 採用雙光束相關檢測技術，改善了系統的信噪比。

sentences.english: The ratio of signal to noise (S/N) is greatly improved through the phase sensitivity detection.
sentences.chinese: 而通過採用相敏檢測的方法又可大大提高信噪比。

sentences.english: The software will display the snr fwhm and rms values found.
sentences.chinese: 軟件將顯示它們的信噪比，點擴展函數和均方差值。

sentences.english: Finally, the table of the optimal loop parameter values under different signal-to-noise ratios is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後，給出了在不同信噪比下的最佳環路參數表。

sentences.english: It is stressed that the relationship between prestack processing S/N and resolution is important.
sentences.chinese: 強調了疊前處理信噪比與分辨率關係的重要性。

sentences.english: In addition, each pixel has its own amplifier for highest possible signal-to-noise ratio.
sentences.chinese: 此外，每個像素都有自己的放大器最高信號的信噪比。

sentences.english: And a single way detection system with higher SNR is set up.
sentences.chinese: 並建立了一個高信噪比的單路檢測系統。

sentences.english: The linear time-invariant filter can' t improve SNR of single frequency component.
sentences.chinese: 線性時不變濾波不能提高單一頻率分量信噪比。

sentences.english: How do we maximize signal to noise ratio in general of course?
sentences.chinese: 我們如何最大限度地提高信噪比一般的課程？

sentences.english: Especially when the signal-to-noise ratio is very low the false alarm probability is very high.
sentences.chinese: 並且當信噪比較低時，會有較高的虛警概率。

sentences.english: The results show that the noise can be filtered when S/N ratio is equal to 10.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，信噪比爲10的高噪聲基本被濾除掉。

sentences.english: Use titles such as Mr or qualifiers such as Snr, Esq .
sentences.chinese: 如使用相近或議員的限制，如信噪比，彼岸。

sentences.english: The challenge of developing such a system is to cope with the physical signal with small signal-to-noise ratio.
sentences.chinese: 其關鍵技術在於如何妥善處理如此小信噪比物理信號。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
